title: HRM website
description: A landing page for a Human Resources Management platform, built using Astro, Tailwind, and Motion One to showcase its features and benefits.

title: Clinic management System
description: Nabd — a sleek clinic management web app powered by Next.js and GraphQL. Designed with Figma, it offers multi-language support.

title: Attendance MS for Employees
description: Iltizame — is a comprehensive AMS platform, leveraging Next.js, Zustand, and GraphQL for seamless functionality. Designed with Figma.

title: Medical Centers Management System
description: PulseCraft — is a versatile Clinic and Medical Centers Management System suitable for facilities of all sizes, designed with Figma and built with Next.js and GraphQL.

title: HRM website
description: A landing page for an international delivery company, created with Figma and tailored with Tailwind CSS
